(xlix) ABUJA accepts two (2) 'A' level  passes in Physics and any 
one (1) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics or Statistics in 
that order or NCE minimum 10 points with ‘O’ level credit 
passes in Physics and another Science subject OR ND 
upper credit  in relevant programmes.  
(l) AUGUSTINE requires two (2) 'A' level passes in Science 
subjects including Mathematics or NCE merit in 
Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science 
subject.  
(li) UNIKINGS accepts 'A' level pass in any Science subjects or 
ND lower credit  in any relevant subjects.  
(lii) MOUNTAIN TOP requires two (2) 'A' level passes in 
relevant subjects Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.
